bill_title: increase the opportunity scholarship award for science, technology, engineering, and math students.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to increase the opportunity scholarship award for science, technology, engineering, and math students. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 13-55 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: The amount of the annual award for an opportunity scholarship award for a student enrolled in a science, technology, engineering, or math program is: (1) One thousand five hundred dollars for the first year of attendance; (2) One thousand five hundred dollars for the second year of attendance; (3) One thousand five hundred dollars for the third year of attendance; (4) Two thousand five hundred dollars for the fourth year of attendance unless the student attended full-time a regionally accredited university, college, or technical school, located outside of South Dakota prior to admission to the program, in which case the award shall be one thousand five hundred dollars. The annual award for a student enrolled in a science, technology, engineering, or math program is effective for first year students commencing after July 1, 2014.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
